printCLI(ModelUtils, List<Cell>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.View
Here I print the CLI for the user, depending on the parameter validMoves If it is null, I print the normal battlefield with the tokens on, with the number on every cell representing its height, X if dome, and the background in the color of the token on it (if present); Otherwise i print even a green backgrounds behind the cells in the ValidMoves param
